data.eml:eml: Argentine Hydrellia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera, Ephydridae): new species and key to identification

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Júnior, Francisco De Assis Rodrigues, Mathis, Wayne Nielsen, Hauser, Martin (2015): Argentine Hydrellia Robineau-Desvoidy (Diptera, Ephydridae): new species and key to identification. Zootaxa 3957 (1): 131-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.1.11
